thread.title: Ranji Trophy: Kerala set for first-innings lead against Hyderabad
thread.title_full: Ranji Trophy: Kerala set for first-innings lead against Hyderabad | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: PTI
title: Ranji Trophy: Kerala set for first-innings lead against Hyderabad
text:
Representational Image dna Research & Archives Kerala are certain to take the first-innings lead as they reduced Hyderabad to 207 for eight in their Ranji Trophy group league match in Hyderabad on Saturday.
At stumps on the third day of the Group C match at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium, hosts Hyderabad were trailing by 194 runs with two wickets remaining in the first innings.
Resuming on their overnight score of 40 for one, Hyderabad found the going tough through the day with left-arm spinner Karaparambil Monish (6/91) being the wrecker in chief. For the home side, opener Akshath Reddy top-scored with 73 off 196 balls. He hit seven fours and a six.
At close of play on the penultimate day, Balchander Anirudh was batting on 54 off 143 balls.
